name: Bright Associates (Bright Resin) D. G. Lacquer Part - A
description: Bright Associates (Bright Resin) D. G. Lacquer Part - A is suitably reacted to obtain A very high cross linking Density with PART - B and Diluted with one part of diluents Forming an ideal combination for Printing on Metalised Polyester Film by Flexo or Gravure Process. Used as Highly reactive butylated type curing agent for stoving paints, roller coatings and foil inks. Mar-proof varnishes, Acid catalyzed Wod finishes.
